amendment.description: Amendment restricts the EPA's ability to enforce SPCC regulations on farms and ranches.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by EPA to enforce the requirements of part 112 of title 40, Code of Federal Regulations with respect to any farm.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A075) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A075) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A075) offered by Mr. Crawford.
